description: Bridges: Method `getCurrentLocaleName()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer;` signature.
Boolean methods do not use `get` prefix, use `is`/`has` instead or alike. Getter `Spryker\Zed\Log\LogConfig::getIsBubble()` must not return bool.
Boolean methods do not use `get` prefix, use `is`/`has` instead or alike. Getter `Spryker\Zed\Log\LogConfig::getIsFlushOnOverflow()` must not return bool.
